title: Ep: 014 - Designing for Family with Architect Noel Fedosh
description: In this special episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down on location with Architect Noel Fedosh of LUNO Design Studio. The conversation centers around the process of designing a home for family, the challenges of building on and island and the decision for Noel to start his own design firm. We really enjoyed this conversation and we hope you do too.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
